results.title: The Impact of Metformin Use with Survival Outcomes in Urologic Cancers: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis
results.text_hl: For @<m>DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001749 @@@bladder cancer@@@, no obvious benefits of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use were identified.

results.title: Profiling and Targeting of Energy and Redox Metabolism in Grade 2 Bladder Cancer Cells with Different Invasiveness Properties
results.text_hl: The ability of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to reduce, although with different efficiency, cell proliferation, sphere formation and migration in both cell lines, suggests that OXPHOS targeting could be an effective strategy to reduce the invasiveness of Grade 2 @<m>DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001749 @@@bladder cancer@@@ cells.

results.title: Synergistic effect of metformin and doxorubicin on the metastatic potential of T24 cells.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: According to our knowledge, we are the first to show, that combination of @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@doxorubicin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ also worth considering in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001749 @@@bladder cancer@@@.

results.title: Metformin-Loaded Chitosan Hydrogels Suppress Bladder Tumor Growth in an Orthotopic Mouse Model via Intravesical Administration
results.text_hl: Our previous study found that the intravesical perfusion of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has excellent inhibitory effects against @<m>DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001749 @@@bladder cancer@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001749 @@@BC@@@).
